Delta Machine: Studio album by Depeche Mode
ڈیلٹا مشین ڈیپیش موڈ البم Depeche Mode Delta Machine album

Delta Machine is the thirteenth studio album by English electronic music band Depeche Mode, released on 22 March 2013 by Columbia and Mute Records. It is the band's first album released under Columbia.
